Offer Origin.description: The company that is extending the offer contained in the mail piece: Authorized Agent/Dealer or Service Provider/Manufacturer

Telecom Type.description: The delivery method of the internet being offered: Cable, DSL, Fiber Optic, Satellite, or Not Specified

Incentive Type.description: Buy One Get One Free, Check, Equipment Discount, Free Minutes, Free Trial, Gift Card/Certificate, Instillation Discount, Installation Discount, Instant Credit, Premium Item, Rebate, Service Discount, or Sweepstake

Offer Description.description: Description of all promotions in the piece. The description should include any incentives or specific details not captured in the pricing

Offer Monthly Cost.description: The cost per month during the introductory offer term

Offer Term.description: The duration in months of the introductory price
